TEXT.S: Parius i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Parius. u kasalumaluma' nu Parius sa, 88 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 246 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 236 ku tademaw, pakalatu 96%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 10 ku tademaw, pakalatu 4%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 94%, Bunun 1%.
